title: Hour 1: NFL Elites
description:
Stephen A., Marcus Spears and Ryan Clark break down Ron Rivera's presser reaction after a win, if Justin Fields is the Bears answer at QB and who wins: Ravens or Giants?

itunes:subtitle: What matchup is more intriguing: Bills at Chiefs or Cowboys at Eagles?
